introduction: Manganese is essential to iron and steel production by virtue of its sulfur-fixing, deoxidizing, and alloying properties. Among a variety of other uses, manganese is a key component of low-cost stainless steel formulations.
flow: The manganese testing is the first step of mining manganese. After manganese tested is manganese mechanical separation, which includes ore crushing, washing, screening, gravity separation, high-intensity magnetic separation and flotation separation, pyrometallurgy enrichment and chemical mineral processing method and so on.
